member.name: T:Asana.User
member.summary: The below classes represent Asana entities.

member.name: T:Asana.Webhook
member.summary: Class represents an Incoming Webhook connection in Slack

member.name: M:Asana.Webhook.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a webhook for use with Slack.
member.param: The URL to send data to
The Slack channel to post to, defaults to #general
The name of the user to post as
The emoji to use as icon. Uses Slack syntax, like :ghost: or :rocket:
An URL to an image to use as the icon.

member.name: M:Asana.Webhook.CreateTask(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Post a message using webhooks
member.param: Specify a webhook object to use. If nothing is supplied, it defaults to the Client's webhook.

member.name: T:Asana.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Asana.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Asana.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Asana.Properties.Resources.add_to_slack
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: P:Asana.Properties.Resources.slack
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: M:Asana.Task.ToJSON

member.summary: Asana client constructor

member.name: M:Asana.Client.TestConnection
member.summary: Test the connection to Asana by querying the API for the current user's data.

member.summary: Checks whether an OAuth token is valid

member.summary: Utility function to send a POST request to a URL using a "payload" request parameter
